summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 50th Avenue Southwest, from West Morgan Street to the north line of Tract 59, Spring Hill Park; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8554 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
